scripts.build: rm -rf lib libtests ; eslint src tests ;  babel src --optional runtime --out-dir lib --source-maps && babel tests --optional runtime --out-dir libtests --source-maps
scripts.test: rm -rf lib libtests ; eslint src tests 1>&2 &&  babel src --optional runtime --out-dir lib --source-maps && babel tests --optional runtime --out-dir libtests --source-maps && ./node_modules/lab/bin/lab libtests/specs -vSl
